thread.title: Sony Xperia Compact Premium with 1080p Display, 4GB of RAM Headed to Japan
thread.title_full: Sony Xperia Compact Premium with 1080p Display, 4GB of RAM Headed to Japan - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Sony Xperia Compact Premium with 1080p Display, 4GB of RAM Headed to Japan
text: A few days ago Sony unveiled the Xperia Z5 Compact, alongside the Xperia Z5 and Xperia Z5 Premium, on the grounds at IFA 2015 in Berlin. The smallest of the three phones launched by the Japanese company, the Xperia Z5 Compact features a 4.6-inch IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen display that supports HD (720p) resolution and features scratch-resistant glass and oleophobic coating. Well, just a few days after Sony introduced the phone, it has become apparent that another ve... Â»
